posts.post_content:
Looking for a graded Johnson Portrait in the 4-6 range. SGC is preferred but would consider PSA as well. Any back is fine. 

I’d appreciate any leads. 
Thanks!

Thanks for the leads from forum members and have seen the current auction offerings, but haven't found exactly the right fit.

Although I've listed 4-6 as the range I'm looking for, also open to higher or lower (especially in tougher backs). 

Would love to pick up a Sovereign or Hindu if anyone has one you'd consider parting with.
